H0.text: Who was known as the Fat Boy of the Reserve. Oliver Hardy

H1.text: Who was known as the Fat Boy of the Reserve. John Candy

H2.text: Who was known as the Fat Boy of the Reserve. Orson Welles

H3.text: Who was known as the Fat Boy of the Reserve. Bunterish

A4.text: He was a big man, standing 6 feet 1 inch (1.85 m) and weighing up to 300 pounds (c.â€‰136 kg), and his size placed limits on the roles that he could play.

A5.text: He was billed as 'Babe Hardy' in many of his later films at Lubin, such as Back to the Farm (1914).
